member.name: T:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.MetricsWebTrackingOptions
member.summary: Provides programmatic configuration for metrics tracking middleware in the App Metrics framework.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.MetricsWebTrackingOptions.ApdexTrackingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the [overall web application's apdex should be measured].
member.remarks: Only valid if UseMetricsApdexTrackingMiddleware configured on the .
member.value: true if [apdex should be measured]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.MetricsWebTrackingOptions.ApdexTSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the apdex t seconds
member.remarks: Only valid if UseMetricsApdexTrackingMiddleware configured on the .

member.name: P:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.MetricsWebTrackingOptions.IgnoredHttpStatusCodes
member.summary: Gets or sets the ignored HTTP status codes as a result of a request where metrics should not be measured.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.MetricsWebTrackingOptions.IgnoredRoutesRegex
member.summary: Gets the ignored request routes where metrics should not be measured.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.MetricsWebTrackingOptions.IgnoredRoutesRegexPatterns
member.summary: Gets or sets the ignored request routes where metrics should not be measured.

member.name: P:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.MetricsWebTrackingOptions.OAuth2TrackingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [oauth2 client tracking should be enabled], if disabled endpoint responds with 404.
member.value: true if [o auth2 tracking enabled]; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:App.Metrics.AspNetCore.Tracking.Middleware.ErrorRequestMeterMiddleware
member.summary: Measures the overall error request rate as well as the rate per endpoint. Also measures these error rates per OAuth2 Client as a separate metric
